Plot: My name is Ravish Ratnesh and I'm 21 years old. By the day I'm a student, writer, a poet and an avid reader. I speak three languages. Hindi, English and Japanese.From the beginning itself I discovered about myself that I have a keen interest in Literature and hence i dropped the idea of becoming an engineer and pursued for my dream in literature.
